thread.title: Tottenham 2-0 Chelsea, Player Ratings: The worst way to start the new year
thread.title_full: Tottenham 2-0 Chelsea, Player Ratings: The worst way to start the new year

author: David Pasztor
title: Tottenham 2-0 Chelsea, Player Ratings: The worst way to start the new year
text:
Touches 32 Distribution 19/29 Courtois continues the fine tradition of Chelsea goalkeepers finishing in the top three for community player ratings in Chelsea losses (or draws). While the big man probably could've done better on Dele's second goal (he neither cut out the cross nor did he position himself properly in anticipation of a header), he, like the rest of the team will no doubt bounce back. Next up, Peterborough in the FA Cup, then Leicester away. A trap game against Hull at home follows that, before a repeat of the back-to-back Liverpool and Arsenal matchups takes us into February. Plenty of points to be won and plenty to fret about. Football! 
STARTERS: Courtois ( 5.6 ), Cahill ( 5.4 ), David Luiz ( 5.5 ), Azpilicueta ( 5.0 ), Alonso ( 4.5 ), Matić ( 6.0 ), Kanté ( 5.0 ), Moses ( 4.7 ), Hazard ( 5.5 ), Costa ( 5.7 ), Pedro ( 4.8 ) 
SUBS: Willian ( 5.2 ), Fàbregas ( 5.5 ), Batshuayi ( 5.3 ) 
OVERALL:
